name: 三界
description:
This is an open-world MMORPG set in a cultivation background. Open world. Free exploration. MMORPG.

Destiny System--------(Current Version)-----Only one chance to choose in a lifetime. Once chosen, it cannot be changed.
Love System-------(Current Version)------You can interact with any NPC or other player with a certain degree of favorability to gain experience.
Neural Network AI-----(Current Version)------AI system completely controlled by neural networks.
Alchemy------------(Current Version)------A highly free alchemy system based entirely on Yin and Yang and the Five Elements.
Weapon Manufacturing------------(Subsequent Version Open)-A highly free custom weapon system based entirely on Yin and Yang and the Five Elements.
Trap Making------------(Subsequent Version Open)-A highly free trap system based entirely on Yin and Yang and the Five Elements.
Scroll Making------------(Subsequent Version Open)-A highly free scroll function based entirely on Yin and Yang and the Five Elements.
Monster Capture------------(Subsequent Version Open)-You can capture and tame any monster you encounter.
Puppet------------(Subsequent Version Open)-You can train your own avatar through soul cultivation techniques.
Life System--------(Current Version)-----When a character is reincarnated into the Jiuzhou realm for the first time, the natural flow of life will begin. Even if the character is not online, their lifespan will decrease. When their life reaches zero, the character will enter a soul state.
Soul System--------(Current Version)-----When life or lifespan reaches zero, this state will be entered. Upon entering this state, the character’s storage bag and equipped items will be emptied, and current experience will be lost. If not resurrected within a certain period of time, the character will be permanently deleted.

Natural rival factions of good and evil are at the player's disposal
